original_title: モーニング娘。'18 FC イベント ～プレモニ。クリスマス会～
overview: At Tokyo's Nittele Lang Lang Hall they play newscaster and Member opinion poll game, and includes a Mini Live. Also; they play ikemen, Member opinion poll, & cute Eripon game, and also a Mini Live. Disc 1 (71mins), Disc 2 (83mins).
title: Morning Musume.'18 FC Event ~Play Moni. Christmas Kai~
